summary.span: 表示委派，它是參考靜態方法或該類別的類別執行個體和執行個體方法 (Instance Method) 的資料結構。

span.span: Represents a delegate, which is a data structure that refers to a static method or to a class instance and an instance method of that class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 類別是委派類型的基底類別。The class is the base class for delegate types. 不過，只有系統和編譯器可以明確地從衍生類別或從類別。However, only the system and compilers can derive explicitly from the class or from the class. 它也不是允許從委派型別衍生新的類型。It is also not permissible to derive a new type from a delegate type. 類別不是委派類型，它是用來衍生的委派類型的類別。The class is not considered a delegate type; it is a class used to derive delegate types. 大部分語言中實作`delegate`關鍵字，而這些語言的編譯器可衍生自類別; 因此，使用者應該使用`delegate`語言所提供的關鍵字。Most languages implement a `delegate` keyword, and compilers for those languages are able to derive from the class; therefore, users should use the `delegate` keyword provided by the language. > [!NOTE] > Common language runtime 提供`Invoke`每個委派類型都使用相同的簽章與委派的方法。The common language runtime provides an `Invoke` method for each delegate type, with the same signature as the delegate. 您不需要明確地呼叫這個方法，從 C#、 Visual Basic 或 Visual c + +，因為編譯器會自動呼叫。You do not have to call this method explicitly from C#, Visual Basic, or Visual C++, because the compilers call it automatically. `Invoke`方法可用於[反映](~/docs/framework/reflection-and-codedom/reflection.md)當您想要尋找的委派類型簽章。The `Invoke` method is useful in [reflection](~/docs/framework/reflection-and-codedom/reflection.md) when you want to find the signature of the delegate type. Common language runtime 提供每個委派類型與`BeginInvoke`和`EndInvoke`方法，來啟用委派的非同步引動過程。The common language runtime provides each delegate type with `BeginInvoke` and `EndInvoke` methods, to enable asynchronous invocation of the delegate. 如需這些方法的詳細資訊，請參閱[Calling Synchronous Methods Asynchronously](~/docs/standard/asynchronous-programming-patterns/calling-synchronous-methods-asynchronously.md)。For more information about these methods, see [Calling Synchronous Methods Asynchronously](~/docs/standard/asynchronous-programming-patterns/calling-synchronous-methods-asynchronously.md). 委派類型的宣告會建立合約，指定一或多個方法的簽章。The declaration of a delegate type establishes a contract that specifies the signature of one or more methods. 委派是參考委派類型的執行個體：A delegate is an instance of a delegate type that has references to: - 類型和目標物件指派給該類型的執行個體方法。An instance method of a type and a target object assignable to that type. - 型別，隱藏的執行個體方法`this`公開型式參數清單中的參數。An instance method of a type, with the hidden `this` parameter exposed in the formal parameter list. 委派是要開啟執行個體的委派。The delegate is said to be an open instance delegate. - 靜態方法。A static method. - 靜態方法，而且目標物件指派給該方法的第一個參數。A static method and a target object assignable to the first parameter of the method. 此委派會在第一個引數上關閉。The delegate is said to be closed over its first argument. 如需有關委派繫結的詳細資訊，請參閱方法多載。For more information on delegate binding, see the method overload. > [!NOTE] > 在.NET framework 1.0 和 1.1 版中，委派可以代表方法，只有當方法的簽章完全符合委派型別所指定的簽章。In the .NET Framework versions 1.0 and 1.1, a delegate can represent a method only if the signature of the method exactly matches the signature specified by the delegate type. 因此，只有第一個和第三個項目符號在上述清單中的都有支援，而第一項需要的確切型別相符項目。Thus, only the first and third bullets in the preceding list are supported, and the first bullet requires an exact type match. 當委派表示其第一個引數 （最常見的情況） 上關閉執行個體方法時，此委派會儲存方法的進入點的參考和參考的物件，稱為目標，也就是指派給類型定義的類型方法。When a delegate represents an instance method closed over its first argument (the most common case), the delegate stores a reference to the method's entry point and a reference to an object, called the target, which is of a type assignable to the type that defined the method. 當委派表示開啟的執行個體方法時，它會儲存至方法的進入點的參考。When a delegate represents an open instance method, it stores a reference to the method's entry point. 委派簽章必須包含隱藏`this`其型式參數清單中的參數; 在此情況下，委派沒有目標物件的參考，並在叫用委派時，就必須提供目標物件。The delegate signature must include the hidden `this` parameter in its formal parameter list; in this case, the delegate does not have a reference to a target object, and a target object must be supplied when the delegate is invoked. 當委派表示靜態方法時，委派就會儲存至方法的進入點的參考。When a delegate represents a static method, the delegate stores a reference to the method's entry point. 當委派表示靜態方法，其第一個引數所覆蓋時，委派會儲存參考方法的進入點和指派給方法的第一個引數類型的目標物件的參考。When a delegate represents a static method closed over its first argument, the delegate stores a reference to the method's entry point and a reference to a target object assignable to the type of the method's first argument. 叫用委派時，靜態方法的第一個引數會接收目標物件。When the delegate is invoked, the first argument of the static method receives the target object. 委派的引動過程清單是在其中清單的每個項目叫用只有其中一個委派所表示之方法的委派的已排序的集合。The invocation list of a delegate is an ordered set of delegates in which each element of the list invokes exactly one of the methods represented by the delegate. 引動過程清單可以包含重複的方法。An invocation list can contain duplicate methods. 在引動過程，方法是以其出現在引動過程清單中的順序叫用。During an invocation, methods are invoked in the order in which they appear in the invocation list. 委派嘗試叫用其引動過程清單中的每個方法重複的項目會叫用之後每次出現在引動過程清單中。A delegate attempts to invoke every method in its invocation list; duplicates are invoked once for each time they appear in the invocation list. 委派是不可變的;建立之後，就不會變更委派的引動過程清單。Delegates are immutable; once created, the invocation list of a delegate does not change. 委派就多點傳送，或可組合的類別，因為委派可以叫用一或多個方法，可用在合併作業。Delegates are referred to as multicast, or combinable, because a delegate can invoke one or more methods and can be used in combining operations. 合併作業，例如和，不會改變現有的委派。Combining operations, such as and , do not alter existing delegates. 相反地，這類作業會傳回新的委派來包含結果的作業，也就是不變的委派，或`null`。Instead, such an operation returns a new delegate that contains the results of the operation, an unchanged delegate, or `null`. 合併作業會傳回`null`作業的結果時不會參考至少一個方法的委派。A combining operation returns `null` when the result of the operation is a delegate that does not reference at least one method. 合併作業會傳回未變更的委派，當要求的作業沒有任何作用。A combining operation returns an unchanged delegate when the requested operation has no effect. > [!NOTE] > Managed 語言使用和實作委派作業的方法。Managed languages use the and methods to implement delegate operations. 範例包括`AddHandler`和`RemoveHandler`Visual Basic 中的陳述式和 + = 和-= 運算子委派 C# 中的型別。Examples include the `AddHandler` and `RemoveHandler` statements in Visual Basic and the += and -= operators on delegate types in C#. 從開始[!INCLUDE[net_v40_long](~/includes/net-v40-long-md.md)]，泛型委派類型可以有 variant 類型參數。Starting with the [!INCLUDE[net_v40_long](~/includes/net-v40-long-md.md)], generic delegate types can have variant type parameters. Contravariant 類型參數可用來當做委派參數類型與 covariant 類型參數可用來當做傳回型別。Contravariant type parameters can be used as parameter types of the delegate, and a covariant type parameter can be used as the return type. 這項功能可讓泛型委派類型從相同泛型類型定義與指派相容其類型引數是否具有繼承關係，參考型別中所述建構[共變數和反變數](~/docs/standard/generics/covariance-and-contravariance.md)。This feature allows generic delegate types that are constructed from the same generic type definition to be assignment-compatible if their type arguments are reference types with an inheritance relationship, as explained in [Covariance and Contravariance](~/docs/standard/generics/covariance-and-contravariance.md). > [!NOTE] > 與指派相容的泛型委派因為時間差異不一定是可組合的類別。Generic delegates that are assignment-compatible because of variance are not necessarily combinable. 若要可組合的類別，類型必須完全相符。To be combinable, the types must match exactly. 例如，假設 具名的類別`Derived`衍生自類別，名為`Base`。For example, suppose that a class named `Derived` is derived from a class named `Base`. 類型的委派`Action`(`Action(Of Base)` Visual Basic 中) 可以指派給類型的變數`Action`，但無法合併兩個委派，因為類型不完全相符。A delegate of type `Action` (`Action(Of Base)` in Visual Basic) can be assigned to a variable of type `Action`, but the two delegates cannot be combined because the types do not match exactly. 如果叫用的方法擲回例外狀況，則方法會停止執行、 例外狀況會傳遞至委派的呼叫端和引動過程清單中的其餘方法不會叫用。If an invoked method throws an exception, the method stops executing, the exception is passed back to the caller of the delegate, and remaining methods in the invocation list are not invoked. 在呼叫端攔截的例外狀況時，不會改變此行為。Catching the exception in the caller does not alter this behavior. 當叫用由委派的方法簽章包含傳回的值時，委派會傳回引動過程清單最後一個元素的傳回值。When the signature of the methods invoked by a delegate includes a return value, the delegate returns the return value of the last element in the invocation list. 當簽章包含傳址方式傳遞的參數時，最後一個參數的值會是每個方法引動過程清單，依序執行，並更新參數的值中的結果。When the signature includes a parameter that is passed by reference, the final value of the parameter is the result of every method in the invocation list executing sequentially and updating the parameter's value. 在 C 中委派的最接近對等項目是函式指標。The closest equivalent of a delegate in C is a function pointer. 委派可以表示的靜態方法或執行個體方法。A delegate can represent a static method or an instance method. 當委派表示執行個體方法時，此委派會儲存參考至方法的進入點，不僅類別執行個體的參考。When the delegate represents an instance method, the delegate stores not only a reference to the method's entry point, but also a reference to the class instance. 不同於函式指標，委派是物件導向和型別安全。Unlike function pointers, delegates are object oriented and type safe. ## Examples 下列範例示範如何定義委派，名為`myMethodDelegate`。The following example shows how to define a delegate named `myMethodDelegate`. 執行個體方法和巢狀的靜態方法建立這個委派的執行個體`mySampleClass`類別。Instances of this delegate are created for an instance method and a static method of the nested `mySampleClass` class. 執行個體方法的委派要求的執行個體`mySampleClass`。The delegate for the instance method requires an instance of `mySampleClass`. `mySampleClass`執行個體儲存在變數，名為`mySC`。The `mySampleClass` instance is saved in a variable named `mySC`. [!code-cpp[Classic Delegate Example#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_Classic/classic Delegate Example/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Classic Delegate Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_Classic/classic Delegate Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic Delegate Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_Classic/classic Delegate Example/VB/source.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個建構函式不能在應用程式程式碼。This constructor cannot be used in application code. 若要建立委派，藉由指定的執行個體方法名稱，使用的多載指定方法名稱和目標物件的方法。To create a delegate by specifying the name of an instance method, use an overload of the method that specifies a method name and a target object. 比方說，方法多載會建立具有指定名稱的執行個體方法的委派。For example, the method overload creates a delegate for an instance method with a specified name. 這個建構函式只會建立委派執行個體方法。This constructor creates delegates for instance methods only. 執行個體方法則是類別; 的執行個體相關聯的方法靜態方法是類別本身相關聯的方法。An instance method is a method that is associated with an instance of a class; a static method is a method that is associated with the class itself.

summary.span: 建立委派的淺層複本 (Shallow Copy)。

span.span: Creates a shallow copy of the delegate.

returns.span: 委派的淺層複本。

span.span: A shallow copy of the delegate.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 複製具有相同，做為原始的委派的目標、 方法和引動過程清單。The clone has the same , target, method, and invocation list as the original delegate. 淺層複本建立與原始物件，而相同類型的新執行個體，並接著會將複製原始物件的非靜態欄位。A shallow copy creates a new instance of the same type as the original object, and then copies the nonstatic fields of the original object. 如果欄位是實值型別，則會執行位元欄位的複本。If the field is a value type, a bit-by-bit copy of the field is performed. 如果欄位是參考型別，則會複製參考，但參考的物件不;因此，在原始物件的參考和複製品中的參考點相同的物件。If the field is a reference type, the reference is copied but the referred object is not; therefore, the reference in the original object and the reference in the clone point to the same object. 相較之下，物件的深層複本複製直接或間接參考的欄位物件中的所有項目。In contrast, a deep copy of an object duplicates everything directly or indirectly referenced by the fields in the object.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果`delegates`陣列包含的項目`null`，這些項目都會被忽略。If the `delegates` array contains entries that are `null`, those entries are ignored. 引動過程清單可以包含重複的項目;也就是指相同的方法相同的物件上的項目。The invocation list can contain duplicate entries; that is, entries that refer to the same method on the same object. > [!NOTE] > 與指派相容的泛型委派因為時間差異不一定是可組合的類別。Generic delegates that are assignment-compatible because of variance are not necessarily combinable. 若要可組合的類別，類型必須完全相符。To be combinable, the types must match exactly. 例如，假設 具名的類別`Derived`衍生自類別，名為`Base`。For example, suppose that a class named `Derived` is derived from a class named `Base`. 類型的委派`Action`(`Action(Of Base)` Visual Basic 中) 可以指派給類型的變數`Action`，如下所述[共變性與逆變性](~/docs/standard/generics/covariance-and-contravariance.md)，但無法合併兩個委派，因為型別不完全相符。A delegate of type `Action` (`Action(Of Base)` in Visual Basic) can be assigned to a variable of type `Action`, as explained in [Covariance and Contravariance](~/docs/standard/generics/covariance-and-contravariance.md), but the two delegates cannot be combined because the types do not match exactly. 可用於建立多個方法的時間事件的呼叫，就會發生的事件處理常式。 is useful for creating event handlers that call multiple methods each time an event occurs.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在.NET Framework 1.0 和 1.1 版中，這個方法多載會建立只有靜態方法的委派。In the .NET Framework version 1.0 and 1.1, this method overload creates delegates for static methods only. 在.NET Framework 2.0 版中，這個方法多載也可以建立開啟的執行個體方法委派，也就是明確地提供隱藏第一個引數的委派執行個體方法。In the .NET Framework version 2.0, this method overload also can create open instance method delegates; that is, delegates that explicitly supply the hidden first argument of instance methods. 如需詳細說明，請參閱更多一般方法多載，可讓您建立所有組合的開放式或封閉式的委派執行個體或靜態方法，並選擇性地指定第一個引數。For a detailed explanation, see the more general method overload, which allows you to create all combinations of open or closed delegates for instance or static methods, and optionally to specify a first argument. > [!NOTE] > 這個方法多載應該時使用委派未關閉透過其第一個引數，因為它在此情況下是稍快。This method overload should be used when the delegate is not closed over its first argument, because it is somewhat faster in that case. 這個方法多載就相當於呼叫方法多載，並指定`true`如`throwOnBindFailure`。This method overload is equivalent to calling the method overload and specifying `true` for `throwOnBindFailure`. > [!NOTE] > 開頭[!INCLUDE[net_v20sp1_long](~/includes/net-v20sp1-long-md.md)]，這個方法可用來存取非公用方法，如果呼叫者已授與使用旗標，並限制為呼叫端的非公用方法的授權集是否授與集或子集效果。Starting with the [!INCLUDE[net_v20sp1_long](~/includes/net-v20sp1-long-md.md)], this method can be used to access non-public methods if the caller has been granted with the flag and if the grant set of the non-public methods is restricted to the caller's grant set, or a subset thereof. (請參閱[反映的安全性考量](~/docs/framework/reflection-and-codedom/security-considerations-for-reflection.md)。)(See [Security Considerations for Reflection](~/docs/framework/reflection-and-codedom/security-considerations-for-reflection.md).) > > 若要使用這項功能，您的應用程式應將目標設為 [!INCLUDE[net_v35_long](~/includes/net-v35-long-md.md)] (含) 以後版本。To use this functionality, your application should target the [!INCLUDE[net_v35_long](~/includes/net-v35-long-md.md)] or later. ## 相容的參數型別和傳回型別Compatible Parameter Types and Return Type 在.NET Framework 2.0 版中，使用這個方法多載建立委派的傳回型別與參數類型必須是相容的參數類型和委派所表示; 方法的傳回型別型別沒有完全相符。In the .NET Framework version 2.0, the parameter types and return type of a delegate created using this method overload must be compatible with the parameter types and return type of the method the delegate represents; the types do not have to match exactly. 這代表鬆散的.NET Framework 1.0 和 1.1 中，類型必須完全相符的版本中的繫結行為。This represents a relaxation of the binding behavior in the .NET Framework version 1.0 and 1.1, where the types must match exactly. 如果委派參數的型別比方法參數的型別更嚴格，則委派的參數與對應的方法參數相容，因為這樣可保證傳遞給委派的引數能夠安全地傳遞給方法。A parameter of a delegate is compatible with the corresponding parameter of a method if the type of the delegate parameter is more restrictive than the type of the method parameter, because this guarantees that an argument passed to the delegate can be passed safely to the method. 同樣的，如果方法的傳回型別比委派的傳回型別更具限制性，由於此保證方法傳回的值會安全地轉換為委派的傳回型別，委派的傳回型別就會相容於方法的傳回型別。Similarly, the return type of a delegate is compatible with the return type of a method if the return type of the method is more restrictive than the return type of the delegate, because this guarantees that the return value of the method can be cast safely to the return type of the delegate. 例如，使用類型參數的委派和傳回型別可以代表具有一個型別的參數的方法以及傳回值的型別。For example, a delegate with a parameter of type and a return type of can represent a method with a parameter of type and a return value of type . ## Examples 本節包含兩個程式碼範例。This section contains two code examples. 第一個範例示範的委派，可以使用這個方法多載來建立兩種： 透過執行個體方法開啟，並開啟移轉的靜態方法。The first example demonstrates the two kinds of delegates that can be created with this method overload: open over an instance method and open over a static method. 第二個程式碼範例會示範相容的參數型別和傳回型別。The second code example demonstrates compatible parameter types and return types. **範例 1****Example 1** 下列程式碼範例示範兩種方式可以建立委派，使用的這個多載方法。The following code example demonstrates the two ways a delegate can be created using this overload of the method. > [!NOTE] > 有兩個多載指定的方法不的第一次的引數，但其功能都相同，但是其中一個可讓您指定是否要在繫結，失敗時擲回，而其他一律會擲回。There are two overloads of the method that specify a but not a first argument; their functionality is the same except that one allows you to specify whether to throw on failure to bind, and the other always throws. 此程式碼範例會使用這兩個多載。This code example uses both overloads. 此範例會宣告類別`C`靜態方法`M2`和執行個體方法`M1`，以及兩個委派型別：`D1`可接受的執行個體`C`和一個字串和`D2`採用字串。The example declares a class `C` with a static method `M2` and an instance method `M1`, and two delegate types: `D1` takes an instance of `C` and a string, and `D2` takes a string. 第二個類別，名為`Example`包含建立委派的程式碼。A second class named `Example` contains the code that creates the delegates. - 類型的委派`D1`，表示開啟執行個體方法，建立執行個體方法`M1`。A delegate of type `D1`, representing an open instance method, is created for the instance method `M1`. 叫用委派時，必須傳遞執行個體。An instance must be passed when the delegate is invoked. - 類型的委派`D2`，表示開啟的靜態方法，靜態方法，建立`M2`。A delegate of type `D2`, representing an open static method, is created for the static method `M2`. [!code-csharp[Delegate.CreateDelegateTOM#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/Delegate.CreateDelegateTOM/cs/openClosedOver.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Delegate.CreateDelegateTOM#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/Delegate.CreateDelegateTOM/VB/openClosedOver.vb#1)] **範例 2****Example 2** 下列程式碼範例示範的參數類型相容性，並傳回型別。The following code example demonstrates compatibility of parameter types and return types. 在程式碼範例定義名為基底類別`Base`和名為類別`Derived`衍生自`Base`。The code example defines a base class named `Base` and a class named `Derived` that derives from `Base`. 衍生的類別有`static`(`Shared` Visual Basic 中) 名為方法`MyMethod`具有一個參數的型別`Base`且傳回類型為`Derived`。The derived class has a `static` (`Shared` in Visual Basic) method named `MyMethod` with one parameter of type `Base` and a return type of `Derived`. 在程式碼範例也會定義名為委派`Example`具有一個參數的型別`Derived`且傳回類型為`Base`。The code example also defines a delegate named `Example` that has one parameter of type `Derived` and a return type of `Base`. 在程式碼範例示範委派名為`Example`可用來表示方法`MyMethod`。The code example demonstrates that the delegate named `Example` can be used to represent the method `MyMethod`. 此方法可以繫結至委派，因為：The method can be bound to the delegate because: - 委派的參數類型 (`Derived`) 是更具限制性的參數型別`MyMethod`(`Base`)，如此一來，它一律是安全地傳遞至委派的引數`MyMethod`。The parameter type of the delegate (`Derived`) is more restrictive than the parameter type of `MyMethod` (`Base`), so that it is always safe to pass the argument of the delegate to `MyMethod`. - 傳回型別`MyMethod`(`Derived`) 是更具限制性的委派參數類型 (`Base`)，如此一來，一定是安全轉型為委派的傳回型別方法的傳回型別。The return type of `MyMethod` (`Derived`) is more restrictive than the parameter type of the delegate (`Base`), so that it is always safe to cast the return type of the method to the return type of the delegate. 在程式碼範例會產生任何輸出。The code example produces no output. [!code-cpp[Delegate.CreateDelegate_RelaxedFit#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/Delegate.CreateDelegate_RelaxedFit/cpp/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Delegate.CreateDelegate_RelaxedFit#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/Delegate.CreateDelegate_RelaxedFit/cs/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Delegate.CreateDelegate_RelaxedFit#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/Delegate.CreateDelegate_RelaxedFit/vb/source.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 呼叫這個方法多載就相當於呼叫方法多載，並指定`true`如`throwOnBindFailure`。Calling this method overload is equivalent to calling the method overload and specifying `true` for `throwOnBindFailure`. 這些兩個多載會提供最具彈性的方式來建立委派。These two overloads provide the most flexible way to create delegates. 您可以使用它們來建立委派的靜態或執行個體方法，並選擇性地指定第一個引數。You can use them to create delegates for either static or instance methods, and optionally to specify the first argument. > [!NOTE] > 如果您未提供第一個引數，使用方法多載，以提升效能。If you do not supply a first argument, use the method overload for better performance. 委派型別和方法必須具有相容傳回型別。The delegate type and the method must have compatible return types. 也就是說，傳回型別`method`必須是指派給的傳回型別`type`。That is, the return type of `method` must be assignable to the return type of `type`. 如果`firstArgument`是提供，則會傳遞至`method`每次叫用委派時;`firstArgument`稱為繫結至委派，以及此委派會在第一個引數上關閉。If `firstArgument` is supplied, it is passed to `method` every time the delegate is invoked; `firstArgument` is said to be bound to the delegate, and the delegate is said to be closed over its first argument. 如果`method`已`static`(`Shared`在 Visual Basic 中)，則引數叫用委派時所提供的清單包含第一個; 以外的所有參數，如果`method`是執行個體方法，然後`firstArgument`傳遞到隱藏的執行個體參數 (由`this`在 C# 中，或由`Me`Visual Basic 中)。If `method` is `static` (`Shared` in Visual Basic), the argument list supplied when invoking the delegate includes all parameters except the first; if `method` is an instance method, then `firstArgument` is passed to the hidden instance parameter (represented by `this` in C#, or by `Me` in Visual Basic). 如果`firstArgument`提供的第一個參數`method`必須是參考型別和`firstArgument`必須相容於該型別。If `firstArgument` is supplied, the first parameter of `method` must be a reference type, and `firstArgument` must be compatible with that type. > [!IMPORTANT] > 如果`method`已`static`(`Shared`在 Visual Basic 中) 以及其第一個參數為類型或，然後`firstArgument`可以是實值型別。If `method` is `static` (`Shared` in Visual Basic) and its first parameter is of type or , then `firstArgument` can be a value type. 在此情況下`firstArgument`會自動進行 boxed 處理。In this case `firstArgument` is automatically boxed. 自動 boxing 不會發生的任何其他引數，因為它會以 C# 或 Visual Basic 函式呼叫。Automatic boxing does not occur for any other arguments, as it would in a C# or Visual Basic function call. 如果`firstArgument`為 null 參考並`method`是執行個體方法，結果會取決於委派型別的簽章`type`以及`method`:If `firstArgument` is a null reference and `method` is an instance method, the result depends on the signatures of the delegate type `type` and of `method`: - 如果簽章`type`明確包含隱藏第一個參數`method`，此委派表示開啟執行個體方法。If the signature of `type` explicitly includes the hidden first parameter of `method`, the delegate is said to represent an open instance method. 叫用委派時，要將引數清單中的第一個引數傳遞給隱藏的執行個體參數`method`。When the delegate is invoked, the first argument in the argument list is passed to the hidden instance parameter of `method`. - 如果簽章`method`和`type`符合 （也就是所有的參數型別都相容），則此委派會在 null 參考上關閉。If the signatures of `method` and `type` match (that is, all parameter types are compatible), then the delegate is said to be closed over a null reference. 叫用委派就像是在 null 執行個體，不是一個特別有用的東西，要呼叫的執行個體方法。Invoking the delegate is like calling an instance method on a null instance, which is not a particularly useful thing to do. 如果`firstArgument`為 null 參考並`method`是靜態的結果會取決於委派型別的簽章`type`以及`method`:If `firstArgument` is a null reference and `method` is static, the result depends on the signatures of the delegate type `type` and of `method`: - 如果簽章`method`和`type`符合 （也就是所有的參數型別都相容），此委派會表示開啟的靜態方法。If the signature of `method` and `type` match (that is, all parameter types are compatible), the delegate is said to represent an open static method. 這是最常見的案例，對於靜態方法。This is the most common case for static methods. 在此情況下，您可以在這裡取得更好的效能使用方法多載。In this case, you can get slightly better performance by using the method overload. - 如果簽章`type`開頭的第二個參數`method`和其餘的參數類型相容，則此委派會在 null 參考上關閉。If the signature of `type` begins with the second parameter of `method` and the rest of the parameter types are compatible, then the delegate is said to be closed over a null reference. 第一個參數來叫用委派時，要傳遞 null 參考`method`。When the delegate is invoked, a null reference is passed to the first parameter of `method`. > [!NOTE] > 開頭[!INCLUDE[net_v20sp1_long](~/includes/net-v20sp1-long-md.md)]，這個方法可用來存取非公用方法，如果呼叫者已授與使用旗標，並限制為呼叫端的非公用方法的授權集是否授與集或子集效果。Starting with the [!INCLUDE[net_v20sp1_long](~/includes/net-v20sp1-long-md.md)], this method can be used to access non-public methods if the caller has been granted with the flag and if the grant set of the non-public methods is restricted to the caller's grant set, or a subset thereof. (請參閱[反映的安全性考量](~/docs/framework/reflection-and-codedom/security-considerations-for-reflection.md)。)(See [Security Considerations for Reflection](~/docs/framework/reflection-and-codedom/security-considerations-for-reflection.md).) > > 若要使用這項功能，您的應用程式應將目標設為 [!INCLUDE[net_v35_long](~/includes/net-v35-long-md.md)] (含) 以後版本。To use this functionality, your application should target the [!INCLUDE[net_v35_long](~/includes/net-v35-long-md.md)] or later. ## 相容的參數型別和傳回型別Compatible Parameter Types and Return Type 參數類型和委派的傳回型別必須與參數類型和委派所表示; 方法的傳回型別相容型別沒有完全相符。The parameter types and return type of a delegate must be compatible with the parameter types and return type of the method the delegate represents; the types do not have to match exactly. > [!NOTE] > 在.NET Framework 1.0 和 1.1 版中，類型必須完全相符。In the .NET Framework version 1.0 and 1.1, the types must match exactly. 如果委派參數的型別比方法參數的型別更嚴格，則委派的參數與對應的方法參數相容，因為這樣可保證傳遞給委派的引數能夠安全地傳遞給方法。A parameter of a delegate is compatible with the corresponding parameter of a method if the type of the delegate parameter is more restrictive than the type of the method parameter, because this guarantees that an argument passed to the delegate can be passed safely to the method. 同樣的，如果方法的傳回型別比委派的傳回型別更具限制性，由於此保證方法傳回的值會安全地轉換為委派的傳回型別，委派的傳回型別就會相容於方法的傳回型別。Similarly, the return type of a delegate is compatible with the return type of a method if the return type of the method is more restrictive than the return type of the delegate, because this guarantees that the return value of the method can be cast safely to the return type of the delegate. 例如，使用類型參數的委派和傳回型別可以代表具有一個型別的參數的方法以及傳回值的型別。For example, a delegate with a parameter of type and a return type of can represent a method with a parameter of type and a return value of type . ## 判斷方法的委派可以表示Determining the Methods a Delegate Can Represent 另一個實用的方式，將這個多載所提供之彈性是任何指定的委派可以代表四個不同的方法簽章和方法種類 （靜態和執行個體） 的組合。Another useful way to think of the flexibility provided by this overload of is that any given delegate can represent four different combinations of method signature and method kind (static versus instance). 委派型別，請考慮`D`argumentem typu `C`。Consider a delegate type `D` with one argument of type `C`. 以下描述方法`D`可以代表，忽略的傳回型別，因為它必須符合在所有情況下：The following describes the methods `D` can represent, ignoring the return type since it must match in all cases: - `D` 可以代表任何有類型只有一個引數的執行個體方法`C`，不論執行個體方法屬於何種類型。`D` can represent any instance method that has exactly one argument of type `C`, regardless of what type the instance method belongs to. 當呼叫時，`firstArgument`是類型的執行個體`method`所屬，並產生的委派會在該執行個體上關閉。When is called, `firstArgument` is an instance of the type `method` belongs to, and the resulting delegate is said to be closed over that instance. (透過極簡方式，`D`也可以關閉透過 null 參考如果`firstArgument`為 null 參考。)(Trivially, `D` can also be closed over a null reference if `firstArgument` is a null reference.) - `D` 可以代表的執行個體方法`C`，沒有任何引數。`D` can represent an instance method of `C` that has no arguments. 當呼叫時，`firstArgument`為 null 參考。When is called, `firstArgument` is a null reference. 產生的委派表示開啟的執行個體方法和執行個體`C`必須提供每次叫用時。The resulting delegate represents an open instance method, and an instance of `C` must be supplied each time it is invoked. - `D` 可以代表採用一個引數類型的靜態方法`C`，而且方法可以屬於任何類型。`D` can represent a static method that takes one argument of type `C`, and that method can belong to any type. 當呼叫時，`firstArgument`為 null 參考。When is called, `firstArgument` is a null reference. 產生的委派表示開啟的靜態方法和執行個體`C`必須提供每次叫用時。The resulting delegate represents an open static method, and an instance of `C` must be supplied each time it is invoked. - `D` 可以代表屬於類型的靜態方法`F`且具有兩個引數，型別的`F`並輸入`C`。`D` can represent a static method that belongs to type `F` and has two arguments, of type `F` and type `C`. 當呼叫時，`firstArgument`的執行個體`F`。When is called, `firstArgument` is an instance of `F`. 產生的委派表示靜態方法，關閉該執行個體透過`F`。The resulting delegate represents a static method that is closed over that instance of `F`. 請注意，萬一其中`F`和`C`都是相同的型別、 靜態方法會具有該類型的兩個引數。Note that in the case where `F` and `C` are the same type, the static method has two arguments of that type. (在此情況下，`D`如果覆蓋 null 參考`firstArgument`為 null 參考。)(In this case, `D` is closed over a null reference if `firstArgument` is a null reference.) ## Examples 本節包含三個程式碼範例。This section contains three code examples. 第一個範例示範委派可建立四種： 覆蓋的執行個體方法，透過執行個體方法，是靜態方法，透過開啟開啟和關閉透過靜態方法。The first example demonstrates the four kinds of delegates that can be created: closed over an instance method, open over an instance method, open over a static method, and closed over a static method. 第二個程式碼範例會示範相容的參數型別和傳回型別。The second code example demonstrates compatible parameter types and return types. 第三個程式碼範例會定義單一的委派類型，並顯示可以代表委派類型的所有方法。The third code example defines a single delegate type, and shows all the methods that delegate type can represent. **範例 1****Example 1** 下列程式碼範例示範可使用的這個多載來建立委派的四種方式方法。The following code example demonstrates the four ways a delegate can be created using this overload of the method. > [!NOTE] > 有兩個多載指定的方法`firstArgument`和; 其功能都相同，但是其中一個可讓您指定是否要在繫結，失敗時擲回，而其他一律會擲回。There are two overloads of the method that specify `firstArgument` and a ; their functionality is the same except that one allows you to specify whether to throw on failure to bind, and the other always throws. 此程式碼範例會使用這兩個多載。This code example uses both overloads. 此範例會宣告類別`C`靜態方法`M2`和執行個體方法`M1`，以及三個委派型別：`D1`可接受的執行個體`C`和字串，`D2`接受字串，而`D3`沒有任何引數。The example declares a class `C` with a static method `M2` and an instance method `M1`, and three delegate types: `D1` takes an instance of `C` and a string, `D2` takes a string, and `D3` has no arguments. 第二個類別，名為`Example`包含建立委派的程式碼。A second class named `Example` contains the code that creates the delegates. - 類型的委派`D2`、 已關閉的執行個體透過`C`，建立執行個體方法`M1`。A delegate of type `D2`, closed over an instance of `C`, is created for the instance method `M1`. 它會使用不同的字串，表示繫結執行個體叫用`C`一律會使用。It is invoked with different strings, to show that the bound instance of `C` is always used. - 類型的委派`D1`，表示開啟執行個體方法，建立執行個體方法`M1`。A delegate of type `D1`, representing an open instance method, is created for the instance method `M1`. 叫用委派時，必須傳遞執行個體。An instance must be passed when the delegate is invoked. - 類型的委派`D2`，表示開啟的靜態方法，靜態方法，建立`M2`。A delegate of type `D2`, representing an open static method, is created for the static method `M2`. - 最後，類型的委派`D3`覆蓋字串、 靜態方法，建立`M2`。Finally, a delegate of type `D3`, closed over a string, is created for the static method `M2`. 方法會叫用來顯示它會使用繫結的字串。The method is invoked to show that it uses the bound string. [!code-csharp[Delegate.CreateDelegateTOM#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/Delegate.CreateDelegateTOM/cs/openClosedOver.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Delegate.CreateDelegateTOM#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/Delegate.CreateDelegateTOM/VB/openClosedOver.vb#1)] **範例 2****Example 2** 下列程式碼範例示範的參數類型相容性，並傳回型別。The following code example demonstrates compatibility of parameter types and return types. > [!NOTE] > 此程式碼範例會使用方法多載。This code example uses the method overload. 使用其他多載會採用類似。The use of other overloads that take is similar. 在程式碼範例定義名為基底類別`Base`和名為類別`Derived`衍生自`Base`。The code example defines a base class named `Base` and a class named `Derived` that derives from `Base`. 衍生的類別有`static`(`Shared` Visual Basic 中) 名為方法`MyMethod`具有一個參數的型別`Base`且傳回類型為`Derived`。The derived class has a `static` (`Shared` in Visual Basic) method named `MyMethod` with one parameter of type `Base` and a return type of `Derived`. 在程式碼範例也會定義名為委派`Example`具有一個參數的型別`Derived`且傳回類型為`Base`。The code example also defines a delegate named `Example` that has one parameter of type `Derived` and a return type of `Base`. 在程式碼範例示範委派名為`Example`可用來表示方法`MyMethod`。The code example demonstrates that the delegate named `Example` can be used to represent the method `MyMethod`. 此方法可以繫結至委派，因為：The method can be bound to the delegate because: - 委派的參數類型 (`Derived`) 是更具限制性的參數型別`MyMethod`(`Base`)，如此一來，它一律是安全地傳遞至委派的引數`MyMethod`。The parameter type of the delegate (`Derived`) is more restrictive than the parameter type of `MyMethod` (`Base`), so that it is always safe to pass the argument of the delegate to `MyMethod`. - 傳回型別`MyMethod`(`Derived`) 是更具限制性的委派參數類型 (`Base`)，如此一來，一定是安全轉型為委派的傳回型別方法的傳回型別。The return type of `MyMethod` (`Derived`) is more restrictive than the parameter type of the delegate (`Base`), so that it is always safe to cast the return type of the method to the return type of the delegate. 在程式碼範例會產生任何輸出。The code example produces no output. [!code-cpp[Delegate.CreateDelegate_RelaxedFit#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/Delegate.CreateDelegate_RelaxedFit/cpp/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Delegate.CreateDelegate_RelaxedFit#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/Delegate.CreateDelegate_RelaxedFit/cs/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Delegate.CreateDelegate_RelaxedFit#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/Delegate.CreateDelegate_RelaxedFit/vb/source.vb#1)] **範例 3****Example 3** 下列程式碼範例顯示所有的方法是單一的委派型別可以代表使用方法用來建立委派。The following code example shows all the methods a single delegate type can represent, using the method to create the delegates. > [!NOTE] > 有兩個多載指定的方法`firstArgument`和; 其功能都相同，但是其中一個可讓您指定是否要在繫結，失敗時擲回，而其他一律會擲回。There are two overloads of the method that specify `firstArgument` and a ; their functionality is the same except that one allows you to specify whether to throw on failure to bind, and the other always throws. 此程式碼範例會使用這兩個多載。This code example uses both overloads. 此程式碼範例會定義兩個類別：`C`和`F`，和委派型別`D`argumentem typu `C`。The code example defines two classes, `C` and `F`, and a delegate type `D` with one argument of type `C`. 類別有相符的靜態和執行個體方法`M1`， `M3`，並`M4`，和類別`C`也有執行個體方法`M2`，沒有任何引數。The classes have matching static and instance methods `M1`, `M3`, and `M4`, and class `C` also has an instance method `M2` that has no arguments. 第三個類別，名為`Example`包含建立委派的程式碼。A third class named `Example` contains the code that creates the delegates. - 委派會建立執行個體方法`M1`型別的`C`並輸入`F`; 透過個別類型的執行個體，每個已關閉。Delegates are created for instance method `M1` of type `C` and type `F`; each is closed over an instance of the respective type. 方法`M1`型別的`C`顯示`ID`屬性繫結的執行個體與引數。Method `M1` of type `C` displays the `ID` properties of the bound instance and of the argument. - 方法建立委派`M2`型別的`C`。A delegate is created for method `M2` of type `C`. 這是開啟的執行個體的委派，其中委派的引數代表方法的執行個體上的隱藏第一個引數。This is an open instance delegate, in which the argument of the delegate represents the hidden first argument on the instance method. 此方法會有任何其他引數。The method has no other arguments. 如同它是一種靜態方法呼叫它。It is called as if it were a static method. - 為靜態方法建立委派`M3`型別的`C`並輸入`F`; 這些是開啟的靜態委派。Delegates are created for static method `M3` of type `C` and type `F`; these are open static delegates. - 最後，委派會建立靜態方法`M4`型別的`C`並輸入`F`; 每個方法都宣告的型別，做為其第一個引數，以及提供型別的執行個體，所以委派會覆蓋其第一個引數.Finally, delegates are created for static method `M4` of type `C` and type `F`; each method has the declaring type as its first argument, and an instance of the type is supplied, so the delegates are closed over their first arguments. 方法`M4`型別的`C`顯示`ID`屬性繫結的執行個體與引數。Method `M4` of type `C` displays the `ID` properties of the bound instance and of the argument. remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個方法只會建立委派執行個體方法。This method creates delegates for instance methods only. 執行個體方法則是類別; 的執行個體相關聯的方法靜態方法是類別本身相關聯的方法。An instance method is a method that is associated with an instance of a class; a static method is a method that is associated with the class itself. 這個方法多載就相當於呼叫方法多載，指定`false`for`ignoreCase`並`true`如`throwOnBindFailure`。This method overload is equivalent to calling the method overload, specifying `false` for `ignoreCase` and `true` for `throwOnBindFailure`. > [!NOTE] > 開頭[!INCLUDE[net_v20sp1_long](~/includes/net-v20sp1-long-md.md)]，這個方法可用來存取非公用方法，如果呼叫者已授與使用旗標，並限制為呼叫端的非公用方法的授權集是否授與集或子集效果。Starting with the [!INCLUDE[net_v20sp1_long](~/includes/net-v20sp1-long-md.md)], this method can be used to access non-public methods if the caller has been granted with the flag and if the grant set of the non-public methods is restricted to the caller's grant set, or a subset thereof. (請參閱[反映的安全性考量](~/docs/framework/reflection-and-codedom/security-considerations-for-reflection.md)。)(See [Security Considerations for Reflection](~/docs/framework/reflection-and-codedom/security-considerations-for-reflection.md).) > > 若要使用這項功能，您的應用程式應將目標設為 [!INCLUDE[net_v35_long](~/includes/net-v35-long-md.md)] (含) 以後版本。To use this functionality, your application should target the [!INCLUDE[net_v35_long](~/includes/net-v35-long-md.md)] or later.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個方法多載可以建立開啟的靜態方法的委派，並開啟執行個體方法委派-也就是公開隱藏的第一個引數的執行個體方法的委派。This method overload can create open static method delegates and open instance method delegates - that is, delegates that expose the hidden first argument of instance methods. 如需詳細說明，請參閱更多一般方法多載，可讓您建立所有組合的開放式或封閉式的委派執行個體或靜態方法。For a detailed explanation, see the more general method overload, which allows you to create all combinations of open or closed delegates for instance or static methods. > [!NOTE] > 這個方法多載應該時使用委派未關閉透過其第一個引數，因為它在此情況下是稍快。This method overload should be used when the delegate is not closed over its first argument, because it is somewhat faster in that case. > [!NOTE] > 開頭[!INCLUDE[net_v20sp1_long](~/includes/net-v20sp1-long-md.md)]，這個方法可用來存取非公用方法，如果呼叫者已授與使用旗標，並限制為呼叫端的非公用方法的授權集是否授與集或子集效果。Starting with the [!INCLUDE[net_v20sp1_long](~/includes/net-v20sp1-long-md.md)], this method can be used to access non-public methods if the caller has been granted with the flag and if the grant set of the non-public methods is restricted to the caller's grant set, or a subset thereof. (請參閱[反映的安全性考量](~/docs/framework/reflection-and-codedom/security-considerations-for-reflection.md)。)(See [Security Considerations for Reflection](~/docs/framework/reflection-and-codedom/security-considerations-for-reflection.md).) > > 若要使用這項功能，您的應用程式應將目標設為 [!INCLUDE[net_v35_long](~/includes/net-v35-long-md.md)] (含) 以後版本。To use this functionality, your application should target the [!INCLUDE[net_v35_long](~/includes/net-v35-long-md.md)] or later. ## 相容的參數型別和傳回型別Compatible Parameter Types and Return Type 參數類型和委派的傳回型別必須與參數類型和委派所表示; 方法的傳回型別相容型別沒有完全相符。The parameter types and return type of a delegate must be compatible with the parameter types and return type of the method the delegate represents; the types do not have to match exactly. > [!NOTE] > 在.NET Framework 1.0 和 1.1 版中，類型必須完全相符。In the .NET Framework version 1.0 and 1.1, the types must match exactly. 如果委派參數的型別比方法參數的型別更嚴格，則委派的參數與對應的方法參數相容，因為這樣可保證傳遞給委派的引數能夠安全地傳遞給方法。A parameter of a delegate is compatible with the corresponding parameter of a method if the type of the delegate parameter is more restrictive than the type of the method parameter, because this guarantees that an argument passed to the delegate can be passed safely to the method. 同樣的，如果方法的傳回型別比委派的傳回型別更具限制性，由於此保證方法傳回的值會安全地轉換為委派的傳回型別，委派的傳回型別就會相容於方法的傳回型別。Similarly, the return type of a delegate is compatible with the return type of a method if the return type of the method is more restrictive than the return type of the delegate, because this guarantees that the return value of the method can be cast safely to the return type of the delegate. 例如，使用類型參數的委派和傳回型別可以代表具有一個型別的參數的方法以及傳回值的型別。For example, a delegate with a parameter of type and a return type of can represent a method with a parameter of type and a return value of type . ## Examples 本節包含兩個程式碼範例。This section contains two code examples. 第一個範例示範的委派，可以使用這個方法多載來建立兩種： 透過執行個體方法開啟，並開啟移轉的靜態方法。The first example demonstrates the two kinds of delegates that can be created with this method overload: open over an instance method and open over a static method. 第二個程式碼範例會示範相容的參數型別和傳回型別。The second code example demonstrates compatible parameter types and return types. **範例 1****Example 1** 下列程式碼範例示範兩種方式可以建立委派，使用的這個多載方法。The following code example demonstrates the two ways a delegate can be created using this overload of the method. > [!NOTE] > 有兩個多載指定的方法不的第一次的引數，但其功能都相同，但是其中一個可讓您指定是否要在繫結，失敗時擲回，而其他一律會擲回。There are two overloads of the method that specify a but not a first argument; their functionality is the same except that one allows you to specify whether to throw on failure to bind, and the other always throws. 此程式碼範例會使用這兩個多載。This code example uses both overloads. 此範例會宣告類別`C`靜態方法`M2`和執行個體方法`M1`，以及兩個委派型別：`D1`可接受的執行個體`C`和一個字串和`D2`採用字串。The example declares a class `C` with a static method `M2` and an instance method `M1`, and two delegate types: `D1` takes an instance of `C` and a string, and `D2` takes a string. 第二個類別，名為`Example`包含建立委派的程式碼。A second class named `Example` contains the code that creates the delegates. - 類型的委派`D1`，表示開啟執行個體方法，建立執行個體方法`M1`。A delegate of type `D1`, representing an open instance method, is created for the instance method `M1`. 叫用委派時，必須傳遞執行個體。An instance must be passed when the delegate is invoked. - 類型的委派`D2`，表示開啟的靜態方法，靜態方法，建立`M2`。A delegate of type `D2`, representing an open static method, is created for the static method `M2`. [!code-csharp[Delegate.CreateDelegateTOM#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/Delegate.CreateDelegateTOM/cs/openClosedOver.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Delegate.CreateDelegateTOM#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/Delegate.CreateDelegateTOM/VB/openClosedOver.vb#1)] **範例 2****Example 2** 下列程式碼範例示範的參數類型相容性，並傳回型別。The following code example demonstrates compatibility of parameter types and return types. > [!NOTE] > 此程式碼範例會使用方法多載。This code example uses the method overload. 使用其他多載會採用類似。The use of other overloads that take is similar. 在程式碼範例定義名為基底類別`Base`和名為類別`Derived`衍生自`Base`。The code example defines a base class named `Base` and a class named `Derived` that derives from `Base`. 衍生的類別有`static`(`Shared` Visual Basic 中) 名為方法`MyMethod`具有一個參數的型別`Base`且傳回類型為`Derived`。The derived class has a `static` (`Shared` in Visual Basic) method named `MyMethod` with one parameter of type `Base` and a return type of `Derived`. 在程式碼範例也會定義名為委派`Example`具有一個參數的型別`Derived`且傳回類型為`Base`。The code example also defines a delegate named `Example` that has one parameter of type `Derived` and a return type of `Base`. 在程式碼範例示範委派名為`Example`可用來表示方法`MyMethod`。The code example demonstrates that the delegate named `Example` can be used to represent the method `MyMethod`. 此方法可以繫結至委派，因為：The method can be bound to the delegate because: - 委派的參數類型 (`Derived`) 是更具限制性的參數型別`MyMethod`(`Base`)，如此一來，它一律是安全地傳遞至委派的引數`MyMethod`。The parameter type of the delegate (`Derived`) is more restrictive than the parameter type of `MyMethod` (`Base`), so that it is always safe to pass the argument of the delegate to `MyMethod`. - 傳回型別`MyMethod`(`Derived`) 是更具限制性的委派參數類型 (`Base`)，如此一來，一定是安全轉型為委派的傳回型別方法的傳回型別。The return type of `MyMethod` (`Derived`) is more restrictive than the parameter type of the delegate (`Base`), so that it is always safe to cast the return type of the method to the return type of the delegate. 在程式碼範例會產生任何輸出。The code example produces no output. [!code-cpp[Delegate.CreateDelegate_RelaxedFit#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/Delegate.CreateDelegate_RelaxedFit/cpp/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Delegate.CreateDelegate_RelaxedFit#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/Delegate.CreateDelegate_RelaxedFit/cs/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Delegate.CreateDelegate_RelaxedFit#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/Delegate.CreateDelegate_RelaxedFit/vb/source.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個方法會建立只有靜態方法的委派。This method creates delegates for static methods only. 執行個體方法則是類別; 的執行個體相關聯的方法靜態方法是類別本身相關聯的方法。An instance method is a method that is associated with an instance of a class; a static method is a method that is associated with the class itself. 這個方法多載就相當於呼叫方法多載，指定`false`for`ignoreCase`並`true`如`throwOnBindFailure`。This method overload is equivalent to calling the method overload, specifying `false` for `ignoreCase` and `true` for `throwOnBindFailure`. > [!NOTE] > 開頭[!INCLUDE[net_v20sp1_long](~/includes/net-v20sp1-long-md.md)]，這個方法可用來存取非公用方法，如果呼叫者已授與使用旗標，並限制為呼叫端的非公用方法的授權集是否授與集或子集效果。Starting with the [!INCLUDE[net_v20sp1_long](~/includes/net-v20sp1-long-md.md)], this method can be used to access non-public methods if the caller has been granted with the flag and if the grant set of the non-public methods is restricted to the caller's grant set, or a subset thereof. (請參閱[反映的安全性考量](~/docs/framework/reflection-and-codedom/security-considerations-for-reflection.md)。)(See [Security Considerations for Reflection](~/docs/framework/reflection-and-codedom/security-considerations-for-reflection.md).) > > 若要使用這項功能，您的應用程式應將目標設為 [!INCLUDE[net_v35_long](~/includes/net-v35-long-md.md)] (含) 以後版本。To use this functionality, your application should target the [!INCLUDE[net_v35_long](~/includes/net-v35-long-md.md)] or later.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個方法多載和方法多載而言，一定要繫結失敗時擲回，提供最具彈性的方式，來建立委派。This method overload and the method overload, which always throws on failure to bind, provide the most flexible way to create delegates. 您可以使用它們來建立委派的靜態或執行個體方法，不論第一個引數。You can use them to create delegates for either static or instance methods, with or without a first argument. > [!NOTE] > 如果您未提供第一個引數，使用方法多載，以提升效能。If you do not supply a first argument, use the method overload for better performance. 委派型別和方法必須具有相容傳回型別。The delegate type and the method must have compatible return types. 也就是說，傳回型別`method`必須是指派給的傳回型別`type`。That is, the return type of `method` must be assignable to the return type of `type`. 如果`firstArgument`是提供，則會傳遞至`method`每次叫用委派時;`firstArgument`稱為繫結至委派，以及此委派會在第一個引數上關閉。If `firstArgument` is supplied, it is passed to `method` every time the delegate is invoked; `firstArgument` is said to be bound to the delegate, and the delegate is said to be closed over its first argument. 如果`method`已`static`(`Shared`在 Visual Basic 中)，則引數叫用委派時所提供的清單包含第一個; 以外的所有參數，如果`method`是執行個體方法，然後`firstArgument`傳遞到隱藏的執行個體參數 (由`this`在 C# 中，或由`Me`Visual Basic 中)。If `method` is `static` (`Shared` in Visual Basic), the argument list supplied when invoking the delegate includes all parameters except the first; if `method` is an instance method, then `firstArgument` is passed to the hidden instance parameter (represented by `this` in C#, or by `Me` in Visual Basic). 如果`firstArgument`提供的第一個參數`method`必須是參考型別和`firstArgument`必須相容於該型別。If `firstArgument` is supplied, the first parameter of `method` must be a reference type, and `firstArgument` must be compatible with that type. > [!IMPORTANT] > 如果`method`已`static`(`Shared`在 Visual Basic 中) 以及其第一個參數為類型或，然後`firstArgument`可以是實值型別。If `method` is `static` (`Shared` in Visual Basic) and its first parameter is of type or , then `firstArgument` can be a value type. 在此情況下`firstArgument`會自動進行 boxed 處理。In this case `firstArgument` is automatically boxed. 自動 boxing 不會發生的任何其他引數，因為它會以 C# 或 Visual Basic 函式呼叫。Automatic boxing does not occur for any other arguments, as it would in a C# or Visual Basic function call. 如果`firstArgument`為 null 參考並`method`是執行個體方法，結果會取決於委派型別的簽章`type`以及`method`:If `firstArgument` is a null reference and `method` is an instance method, the result depends on the signatures of the delegate type `type` and of `method`: - 如果簽章`type`明確包含隱藏第一個參數`method`，此委派表示開啟執行個體方法。If the signature of `type` explicitly includes the hidden first parameter of `method`, the delegate is said to represent an open instance method. 叫用委派時，要將引數清單中的第一個引數傳遞給隱藏的執行個體參數`method`。When the delegate is invoked, the first argument in the argument list is passed to the hidden instance parameter of `method`. - 如果簽章`method`和`type`符合 （也就是所有的參數型別都相容），則此委派會在 null 參考上關閉。If the signatures of `method` and `type` match (that is, all parameter types are compatible), then the delegate is said to be closed over a null reference. 叫用委派就像是在 null 執行個體，不是一個特別有用的東西，要呼叫的執行個體方法。Invoking the delegate is like calling an instance method on a null instance, which is not a particularly useful thing to do. 如果`firstArgument`為 null 參考並`method`是靜態的結果會取決於委派型別的簽章`type`以及`method`:If `firstArgument` is a null reference and `method` is static, the result depends on the signatures of the delegate type `type` and of `method`: - 如果簽章`method`和`type`符合 （也就是所有的參數型別都相容），此委派會表示開啟的靜態方法。If the signature of `method` and `type` match (that is, all parameter types are compatible), the delegate is said to represent an open static method. 這是最常見的案例，對於靜態方法。This is the most common case for static methods. 在此情況下，您可以在這裡取得更好的效能使用方法多載。In this case, you can get slightly better performance by using the method overload. - 如果簽章`type`開頭的第二個參數`method`和其餘的參數類型相容，則此委派會在 null 參考上關閉。If the signature of `type` begins with the second parameter of `method` and the rest of the parameter types are compatible, then the delegate is said to be closed over a null reference. 第一個參數來叫用委派時，要傳遞 null 參考`method`。When the delegate is invoked, a null reference is passed to the first parameter of `method`. > [!NOTE] > 開頭[!INCLUDE[net_v20sp1_long](~/includes/net-v20sp1-long-md.md)]，這個方法可用來存取非公用方法，如果呼叫者已授與使用旗標，並限制為呼叫端的非公用方法的授權集是否授與集或子集效果。Starting with the [!INCLUDE[net_v20sp1_long](~/includes/net-v20sp1-long-md.md)], this method can be used to access non-public methods if the caller has been granted with the flag and if the grant set of the non-public methods is restricted to the caller's grant set, or a subset thereof. (請參閱[反映的安全性考量](~/docs/framework/reflection-and-codedom/security-considerations-for-reflection.md)。)(See [Security Considerations for Reflection](~/docs/framework/reflection-and-codedom/security-considerations-for-reflection.md).) > > 若要使用這項功能，您的應用程式應將目標設為 [!INCLUDE[net_v35_long](~/includes/net-v35-long-md.md)] (含) 以後版本。To use this functionality, your application should target the [!INCLUDE[net_v35_long](~/includes/net-v35-long-md.md)] or later. ## 相容的參數型別和傳回型別Compatible Parameter Types and Return Type 參數類型和委派的傳回型別必須與參數類型和委派所表示; 方法的傳回型別相容型別沒有完全相符。The parameter types and return type of a delegate must be compatible with the parameter types and return type of the method the delegate represents; the types do not have to match exactly. > [!NOTE] > .NET Framework 1.0 和 1.1 版中的類型必須完全相符。In the .NET Framework version 1.0 and 1.1 the types must match exactly. 如果委派參數的型別比方法參數的型別更嚴格，則委派的參數與對應的方法參數相容，因為這樣可保證傳遞給委派的引數能夠安全地傳遞給方法。A parameter of a delegate is compatible with the corresponding parameter of a method if the type of the delegate parameter is more restrictive than the type of the method parameter, because this guarantees that an argument passed to the delegate can be passed safely to the method. 同樣的，如果方法的傳回型別比委派的傳回型別更具限制性，由於此保證方法傳回的值會安全地轉換為委派的傳回型別，委派的傳回型別就會相容於方法的傳回型別。Similarly, the return type of a delegate is compatible with the return type of a method if the return type of the method is more restrictive than the return type of the delegate, because this guarantees that the return value of the method can be cast safely to the return type of the delegate. 例如，使用類型參數的委派和傳回型別可以代表具有一個型別的參數的方法以及傳回值的型別。For example, a delegate with a parameter of type and a return type of can represent a method with a parameter of type and a return value of type . ## 判斷方法的委派可以表示Determining the Methods a Delegate Can Represent 另一個實用的方式，將這個多載所提供之彈性是任何指定的委派可以代表四個不同的方法簽章和方法種類 （靜態和執行個體） 的組合。Another useful way to think of the flexibility provided by this overload of is that any given delegate can represent four different combinations of method signature and method kind (static versus instance). 委派型別，請考慮`D`argumentem typu `C`。Consider a delegate type `D` with one argument of type `C`. 以下描述方法`D`可以代表，忽略的傳回型別，因為它必須符合在所有情況下：The following describes the methods `D` can represent, ignoring the return type since it must match in all cases: - `D` 可以代表任何有類型只有一個引數的執行個體方法`C`，不論執行個體方法屬於何種類型。`D` can represent any instance method that has exactly one argument of type `C`, regardless of what type the instance method belongs to. 當呼叫時，`firstArgument`是類型的執行個體`method`所屬，並產生的委派會在該執行個體上關閉。When is called, `firstArgument` is an instance of the type `method` belongs to, and the resulting delegate is said to be closed over that instance. (透過極簡方式，`D`也可以關閉透過 null 參考若`firstArgument`是`null`。)(Trivially, `D` can also be closed over a null reference if `firstArgument` is `null`.) - `D` 可以代表的執行個體方法`C`，沒有任何引數。`D` can represent an instance method of `C` that has no arguments. 當呼叫時，`firstArgument`為 null 參考。When is called, `firstArgument` is a null reference. 產生的委派表示開啟的執行個體方法和執行個體`C`必須提供每次叫用時。The resulting delegate represents an open instance method, and an instance of `C` must be supplied each time it is invoked. - `D` 可以代表採用一個引數類型的靜態方法`C`，而且方法可以屬於任何類型。`D` can represent a static method that takes one argument of type `C`, and that method can belong to any type. 當呼叫時，`firstArgument`為 null 參考。When is called, `firstArgument` is a null reference. 產生的委派表示開啟的靜態方法和執行個體`C`必須提供每次叫用時。The resulting delegate represents an open static method, and an instance of `C` must be supplied each time it is invoked. - `D` 可以代表屬於類型的靜態方法`F`且具有兩個引數，型別的`F`並輸入`C`。`D` can represent a static method that belongs to type `F` and has two arguments, of type `F` and type `C`. 當呼叫時，`firstArgument`的執行個體`F`。When is called, `firstArgument` is an instance of `F`. 產生的委派表示靜態方法，關閉該執行個體透過`F`。The resulting delegate represents a static method that is closed over that instance of `F`. 請注意，萬一其中`F`和`C`都是相同的型別、 靜態方法會具有該類型的兩個引數。Note that in the case where `F` and `C` are the same type, the static method has two arguments of that type. (在此情況下，`D`如果覆蓋 null 參考`firstArgument`是`null`。)(In this case, `D` is closed over a null reference if `firstArgument` is `null`.) ## Examples 本節包含三個程式碼範例。This section contains three code examples. 第一個範例示範委派可建立四種： 覆蓋的執行個體方法，透過執行個體方法，是靜態方法，透過開啟開啟和關閉透過靜態方法。The first example demonstrates the four kinds of delegates that can be created: closed over an instance method, open over an instance method, open over a static method, and closed over a static method. 第二個程式碼範例會示範相容的參數型別和傳回型別。The second code example demonstrates compatible parameter types and return types. 第三個程式碼範例會定義單一的委派類型，並顯示可以代表委派類型的所有方法。The third code example defines a single delegate type, and shows all the methods that delegate type can represent. **範例 1****Example 1** 下列程式碼範例示範可使用的這個多載來建立委派的四種方式方法。The following code example demonstrates the four ways a delegate can be created using this overload of the method. > [!NOTE] > 有兩個多載指定的方法`firstArgument`和; 其功能都相同，但是其中一個可讓您指定是否要在繫結，失敗時擲回，而其他一律會擲回。There are two overloads of the method that specify `firstArgument` and a ; their functionality is the same except that one allows you to specify whether to throw on failure to bind, and the other always throws. 此程式碼範例會使用這兩個多載。This code example uses both overloads. 此範例會宣告類別`C`靜態方法`M2`和執行個體方法`M1`，以及三個委派型別：`D1`可接受的執行個體`C`和字串，`D2`接受字串，而`D3`沒有任何引數。The example declares a class `C` with a static method `M2` and an instance method `M1`, and three delegate types: `D1` takes an instance of `C` and a string, `D2` takes a string, and `D3` has no arguments. 第二個類別，名為`Example`包含建立委派的程式碼。A second class named `Example` contains the code that creates the delegates. - 類型的委派`D2`、 已關閉的執行個體透過`C`，建立執行個體方法`M1`。A delegate of type `D2`, closed over an instance of `C`, is created for the instance method `M1`. 它會使用不同的字串，表示繫結執行個體叫用`C`一律會使用。It is invoked with different strings, to show that the bound instance of `C` is always used. - 類型的委派`D1`，表示開啟執行個體方法，建立執行個體方法`M1`。A delegate of type `D1`, representing an open instance method, is created for the instance method `M1`. 叫用委派時，必須傳遞執行個體。An instance must be passed when the delegate is invoked. - 類型的委派`D2`，表示開啟的靜態方法，靜態方法，建立`M2`。A delegate of type `D2`, representing an open static method, is created for the static method `M2`. - 最後，類型的委派`D3`覆蓋字串、 靜態方法，建立`M2`。Finally, a delegate of type `D3`, closed over a string, is created for the static method `M2`. 方法會叫用來顯示它會使用繫結的字串。The method is invoked to show that it uses the bound string. [!code-csharp[Delegate.CreateDelegateTOM#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/Delegate.CreateDelegateTOM/cs/openClosedOver.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Delegate.CreateDelegateTOM#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/Delegate.CreateDelegateTOM/VB/openClosedOver.vb#1)] **範例 2****Example 2** 下列程式碼範例示範的參數類型相容性，並傳回型別。The following code example demonstrates compatibility of parameter types and return types. > [!NOTE] > 此程式碼範例會使用方法多載。This code example uses the method overload. 使用其他多載會採用類似。The use of other overloads that take is similar. 在程式碼範例定義名為基底類別`Base`和名為類別`Derived`衍生自`Base`。The code example defines a base class named `Base` and a class named `Derived` that derives from `Base`. 衍生的類別有`static`(`Shared` Visual Basic 中) 名為方法`MyMethod`具有一個參數的型別`Base`且傳回類型為`Derived`。The derived class has a `static` (`Shared` in Visual Basic) method named `MyMethod` with one parameter of type `Base` and a return type of `Derived`. 在程式碼範例也會定義名為委派`Example`具有一個參數的型別`Derived`且傳回類型為`Base`。The code example also defines a delegate named `Example` that has one parameter of type `Derived` and a return type of `Base`. 在程式碼範例示範委派名為`Example`可用來表示方法`MyMethod`。The code example demonstrates that the delegate named `Example` can be used to represent the method `MyMethod`. 此方法可以繫結至委派，因為：The method can be bound to the delegate because: - 委派的參數類型 (`Derived`) 是更具限制性的參數型別`MyMethod`(`Base`)，如此一來，它一律是安全地傳遞至委派的引數`MyMethod`。The parameter type of the delegate (`Derived`) is more restrictive than the parameter type of `MyMethod` (`Base`), so that it is always safe to pass the argument of the delegate to `MyMethod`. - 傳回型別`MyMethod`(`Derived`) 是更具限制性的委派參數類型 (`Base`)，如此一來，一定是安全轉型為委派的傳回型別方法的傳回型別。The return type of `MyMethod` (`Derived`) is more restrictive than the parameter type of the delegate (`Base`), so that it is always safe to cast the return type of the method to the return type of the delegate. 在程式碼範例會產生任何輸出。The code example produces no output. [!code-cpp[Delegate.CreateDelegate_RelaxedFit#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/Delegate.CreateDelegate_RelaxedFit/cpp/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Delegate.CreateDelegate_RelaxedFit#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/Delegate.CreateDelegate_RelaxedFit/cs/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Delegate.CreateDelegate_RelaxedFit#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/Delegate.CreateDelegate_RelaxedFit/vb/source.vb#1)] **範例 3****Example 3** 下列程式碼範例顯示單一的委派類型可以表示的所有方法。The following code example shows all the methods a single delegate type can represent. > [!NOTE] > 有兩個多載指定的方法`firstArgument`和; 其功能都相同，但是其中一個可讓您指定是否要在繫結，失敗時擲回，而其他一律會擲回。There are two overloads of the method that specify `firstArgument` and a ; their functionality is the same except that one allows you to specify whether to throw on failure to bind, and the other always throws. 此程式碼範例會使用這兩個多載。This code example uses both overloads. 此程式碼範例會定義兩個類別：`C`和`F`，和委派型別`D`argumentem typu `C`。The code example defines two classes, `C` and `F`, and a delegate type `D` with one argument of type `C`. 類別有相符的靜態和執行個體方法`M1`， `M3`，並`M4`，和類別`C`也有執行個體方法`M2`，沒有任何引數。The classes have matching static and instance methods `M1`, `M3`, and `M4`, and class `C` also has an instance method `M2` that has no arguments. 第三個類別，名為`Example`包含建立委派的程式碼。A third class named `Example` contains the code that creates the delegates. - 委派會建立執行個體方法`M1`型別的`C`並輸入`F`; 透過個別類型的執行個體，每個已關閉。Delegates are created for instance method `M1` of type `C` and type `F`; each is closed over an instance of the respective type. 方法`M1`型別的`C`顯示`ID`屬性繫結的執行個體與引數。Method `M1` of type `C` displays the `ID` properties of the bound instance and of the argument. - 方法建立委派`M2`型別的`C`。A delegate is created for method `M2` of type `C`. 這是開啟的執行個體的委派，其中委派的引數代表方法的執行個體上的隱藏第一個引數。This is an open instance delegate, in which the argument of the delegate represents the hidden first argument on the instance method. 此方法會有任何其他引數。The method has no other arguments. - 為靜態方法建立委派`M3`型別的`C`並輸入`F`; 這些是開啟的靜態委派。Delegates are created for static method `M3` of type `C` and type `F`; these are open static delegates. - 最後，委派會建立靜態方法`M4`型別的`C`並輸入`F`; 每個方法都宣告的型別，做為其第一個引數，以及提供型別的執行個體，所以委派會覆蓋其第一個引數.Finally, delegates are created for static method `M4` of type `C` and type `F`; each method has the declaring type as its first argument, and an instance of the type is supplied, so the delegates are closed over their first arguments. 方法`M4`型別的`C`顯示`ID`屬性繫結的執行個體與引數。Method `M4` of type `C` displays the `ID` properties of the bound instance and of the argument. remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個方法只會建立委派執行個體方法。This method creates delegates for instance methods only. 執行個體方法則是類別; 的執行個體相關聯的方法靜態方法是類別本身相關聯的方法。An instance method is a method that is associated with an instance of a class; a static method is a method that is associated with the class itself. 這個方法多載就相當於呼叫方法多載，指定`true`如`throwOnBindFailure`。This method overload is equivalent to calling the method overload, specifying `true` for `throwOnBindFailure`. > [!NOTE] > 開頭[!INCLUDE[net_v20sp1_long](~/includes/net-v20sp1-long-md.md)]，這個方法可用來存取非公用方法，如果呼叫者已授與使用旗標，並限制為呼叫端的非公用方法的授權集是否授與集或子集效果。Starting with the [!INCLUDE[net_v20sp1_long](~/includes/net-v20sp1-long-md.md)], this method can be used to access non-public methods if the caller has been granted with the flag and if the grant set of the non-public methods is restricted to the caller's grant set, or a subset thereof. (請參閱[反映的安全性考量](~/docs/framework/reflection-and-codedom/security-considerations-for-reflection.md)。)(See [Security Considerations for Reflection](~/docs/framework/reflection-and-codedom/security-considerations-for-reflection.md).) > > 若要使用這項功能，您的應用程式應將目標設為 [!INCLUDE[net_v35_long](~/includes/net-v35-long-md.md)] (含) 以後版本。To use this functionality, your application should target the [!INCLUDE[net_v35_long](~/includes/net-v35-long-md.md)] or later.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果兩個委派型別相同，它們不會視為相等。If the two delegates are not of the same type, they are not considered equal. > [!IMPORTANT] > 在.NET Framework 1.0 和 1.1 版中，兩個委派視為相等，如果其目標、 方法和引動過程清單等於，即使委派的型別不同。In the .NET Framework version 1.0 and 1.1, two delegates were considered equal if their targets, methods, and invocation list were equal, even if the delegates were of different types. 方法和目標會比較相等，如下所示：The methods and targets are compared for equality as follows: - 如果要比較的兩個方法都是靜態，而且都是相同的類別上的相同方法，方法都視為相等，並為目標也會視為相等。If the two methods being compared are both static and are the same method on the same class, the methods are considered equal and the targets are also considered equal. - 如果要比較的兩種方法是執行個體方法，而且都是相同物件上的相同方法，方法都視為相等，並為目標也會視為相等。If the two methods being compared are instance methods and are the same method on the same object, the methods are considered equal and the targets are also considered equal. - 否則，方法不會被視為相等，而且目標也不會視為相等。Otherwise, the methods are not considered to be equal and the targets are also not considered to be equal. 只有具有相同的順序，而且在兩個清單的對應項目代表相同的方法和目標，則兩個引動過程清單會視為相同。Two invocation lists are considered identical only if they have the same order and the corresponding elements from the two lists represent the same method and target.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個方法的傳回值必須不會保存兩個原因。The return value of this method must not be persisted for two reasons. 首先，類別的雜湊函式可能會改變以產生更好的分佈，呈現從舊的雜湊函式的任何值沒有什麼用處。First, the hash function of a class might be altered to generate a better distribution, rendering any values from the old hash function useless. 其次，這個類別的預設實作不保證相同的值會由不同執行個體。Second, the default implementation of this class does not guarantee that the same value will be returned by different instances.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 陣列中的每個委派代表一個方法。Each delegate in the array represents exactly one method. 陣列中委派的順序是目前的委派叫用這些委派代表之方法的相同順序。The order of the delegates in the array is the same order in which the current delegate invokes the methods that those delegates represent. ## Examples 下列範例會將三個方法指派給委派。The following example assigns three methods to a delegate. 然後它會呼叫方法來取得指派給委派，以相反順序中，執行委派，並執行其名稱不包含子字串的方法之方法的總計數，「 檔案 」。It then calls the method to get a total count of the methods assigned to the delegate, to execute the delegates in reverse order, and to execute the methods whose name do not include the substring "File". remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果它們都是不同的類型，或有不同的方法、 不同的目標或不同的引動過程清單，即視為等於不到兩個委派。Two delegates are considered not equal if they are of different types, or have different methods, different targets, or different invocation lists. 如果兩個委派型別相同，它們不會視為相等。If the two delegates are not of the same type, they are not considered equal. > [!IMPORTANT] > 在.NET Framework 1.0 和 1.1 版中，兩個委派視為相等，如果其目標、 方法和引動過程清單等於，即使委派的型別不同。In the .NET Framework version 1.0 and 1.1, two delegates are considered equal if their targets, methods, and invocation list were equal, even if the delegates were of different types. 方法和目標會比較相等，如下所示：The methods and targets are compared for equality as follows: - 如果要比較的兩個方法都是靜態，而且都是相同的類別上的相同方法，方法都視為相等，並為目標也會視為相等。If the two methods being compared are both static and are the same method on the same class, the methods are considered equal and the targets are also considered equal. - 如果要比較的兩種方法是執行個體方法，而且都是相同物件上的相同方法，方法都視為相等，並為目標也會視為相等。If the two methods being compared are instance methods and are the same method on the same object, the methods are considered equal and the targets are also considered equal. - 否則，方法不會被視為相等，而且目標也不會視為相等。Otherwise, the methods are not considered to be equal and the targets are also not considered to be equal. 兩個引動過程清單不相等，如果它們擁有不同的大小，以不同的方式排序，或至少一個項目從一份清單表示方法或不同於其他清單中其對應項目所代表的目標。Two invocation lists are not equal if they have different sizes, if they are ordered differently, or if at least one element from one list represents a method or target that is different from that represented by its corresponding element in the other list. 這個運算子的對等方法是 The equivalent method for this operator is

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果引動過程清單`value`符合一組連續的引動過程清單中的項目數`source`，然後引動過程清單`value`即為發生的引動過程清單內`source`。If the invocation list of `value` matches a contiguous set of elements in the invocation list of `source`, then the invocation list of `value` is said to occur within the invocation list of `source`. 如果引動過程清單`value`出現在引動過程清單中的一次以上`source`，已移除的最後一個相符項目。If the invocation list of `value` occurs more than once in the invocation list of `source`, the last occurrence is removed.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 執行個體方法則是類別; 的執行個體相關聯的方法靜態方法是類別本身相關聯的方法。An instance method is a method that is associated with an instance of a class; a static method is a method that is associated with the class itself. 如果委派叫用一或多個執行個體方法，這個屬性會傳回目標的最後一個執行個體方法的引動過程清單中。If the delegate invokes one or more instance methods, this property returns the target of the last instance method in the invocation list.
